text:
The district police organised a motorcycle rally here on Wednesday to create awareness on the importance of wearing helmets.

Organised as part of the Road Safety Week observance, over 700 people including friends of police, and civil society groups took part in the rally.

The rally traversed through the streets of Dharmapuri, along Dharmapuri district police complex, medical college hospital, four road junction, Periyar statue junction among others.
title: Helmet awareness rally taken out
